content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I read the contents of "new_file.txt" and appended more text to it. I attempted to get hyperlinks from a Wikipedia page using the "google" command, but it returned too much output. I was instructed not to execute it again with the same arguments. Later, I executed the "ls -la" command and received a list of files, including "new_file.txt".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt", "text": "This is some text that I am writing to the new file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
